title: if You Spend in the Way of Allah, Allah will Give you 70000% Profit - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: and Allah is repeating the same thing before your fathers or for your sons or for your brothers or for your spouses wives and husbands or for your relatives and Allah continues and the we that they have mared Allah says in Surah Bak chapter number two verse number 261 that the parable of those who spend the way in the way of Allah subhana tala a grain of corn and that corn become seven years each year bearing 100 corns that means that one grain becomes 700 greins Allah says if you spend in the way of Allah Allah will give you 700 times profit in business terminology 70,000 profit
